document_data.mainbody:
Axerock was a duergar cleric in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
He was deceitful and greedy.
Axerock was a cleric.
He wore chain mail and carried a powerful, enchanted hand axe. He also had a garnet, a topaz and two agates, though hed been divested of them recently.
In the mid-to-late 14 century DR, Axerock came into conflict with two drow who stole his four gemstones and threw him into a pit. Adventurers may have chanced upon him if they agreed to release him, hed have turned invisible and fled, stalking them and waiting for the lot to come across these drow and inevitably fight. If they did, hed attack whoever won that fight he wouldnt slay the adventurers if they were taken down by the drow, however.
